author: icyJoseph
message:
docs: add missing switcher (#81489)

Fixing a couple of code snippets annoyances

files.patch:
@@ -237,7 +237,7 @@ Next.js optimizes CSS during production builds by automatically chunking (mergin
 
 For example, `base-button.module.css` will be ordered before `page.module.css` since `<BaseButton>` is imported before `page.module.css`:
 
-```tsx filename="page.ts" switcher
+```tsx filename="page.tsx" switcher
 import { BaseButton } from './base-button'
 import styles from './page.module.css'

@@ -524,7 +524,7 @@ web-push generate-vapid-keys
 
 Copy the output and paste the keys into your `.env` file:
 
-```.env
+```
 NEXT_PUBLIC_VAPID_PUBLIC_KEY=your_public_key_here
 VAPID_PRIVATE_KEY=your_private_key_here
 ```
